name: Pickle Boy[DEMO]
description:
Pickle Boy se embarca en una aventura con su gran espada para hacer frente al Jefe Demonio. En su camino deberá defenderse de las peligrosas pompas rosas y hacerlas estallar para librarse de ellas, y podrá encontrar comida vitaminada que le ayude a reponerse.

[Este producto es una DEMO]

---------------------------------------

Pickle Boy embarks on an adventure with his great sword to face the Demon Boss. On his way he will have to defend himself from the dangerous pink bubbles and blow them up to get rid of them, and he will be able to find vitaminized food to help him recover.

[This product is a DEMO]
